alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 6:33PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elk City, Dixie, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
